rules.description: Hyper Key (caps lock -> ctrl + option + shift + command)
home row arrow keys (cmd + left) (right cmd pressed first)
home row arrow keys (cmd + down) (right cmd pressed first)
home row arrow keys (cmd + up) (right cmd pressed first)
home row arrow keys (cmd + right) (right cmd pressed first)
home row arrow keys (option + left) (right cmd pressed first)
home row arrow keys (option + down) (right cmd pressed first)
home row arrow keys (option + up) (right cmd pressed first)
home row arrow keys (option + right) (right cmd pressed first)
